original_title: X-Press Pearl case postponed to 15th May, says AG Department
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The two-day parliamentary debate on the environmental damage caused by the fire and sinking of the X-Press Pearl, will begin today.

The Attorney General's  Department says that the proceedings of the case filed before a court in Singapore demanding compensation for the environmental damage caused by the X-Press Pearl maritime disaster, have been postponed until the 15th of May.
